name: 𝓂𝒶𝑔𝒾𝒸𝒶𝓁 Cave
description:
Description:

You play as a light bearer, a human that harnesses the power of light. Your light has three different colors and each one of them reveals unique obstacles. It is also reactive to different kinds of seekers which are monsters who kills light. Your goal is to enter the magical cave that is heavily guarded by seekers in order to solve the mystery of the origin of bearers and seekers.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

Hold Shift - Run

Spacebar - Jump

Q - Toggle white light

E - Toggle blue light

R - Toggle red light

Left Click - Fire

Game Information:

White Projectile - Damages enemies

Blue Projectile - Teleportation

Red Projectile - Inflicts Fear

Mushroom - Healing + Game currency
